short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A crypto wallet for domainers: easily interact with onchain identities, assets and apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the latest update to the Unstoppable Browser Extension: now including a full-featured Web3 wallet and messaging platform. While continuing to resolve onchain websites with ease, the upgraded interface focuses on simplicity and usability, delivering an onchain experience that's easier than ever.

Unstoppable Lite Wallet Integration

Accessible directly within our browser extension interface, Unstoppable Lite Wallet allows you to manage your domains and cryptocurrencies with ease. Forget complex seed phrases for wallet recovery, simply use an email address and password!

Full Web3 Functionality

Use the browser extension to sign transactions when interacting with dApps across the onchain ecosystem, similar to other popular browser wallets, like Phantom and MetaMask.

Unstoppable Messaging

Your conversations are always at your fingertips with the Unstoppable Domains mobile app, website, and now the browser extension. Stay connected by messaging domain owners directly with end-to-end encrypted chat on the XMTP network. Also, participate in team-based Group Chat, powered by Push Protocol.

Sherlock Assistant 

Introducing Sherlock, your onchain domain assistant.

Automatically discover wallet addresses associated with onchain domains, giving you deeper insight into identity as you browse the web
Highlight text on any page to quickly find related domains
Enhanced app connection management, so you can quickly tell if an app is authorized to connect to your wallet

Browse Onchain Websites

Seamlessly access onchain websites in leading browsers such as Chrome, Edge, Opera and Brave (Firefox coming soon) by typing a .crypto, .nft, .blockchain, or other supported domain directly into your browserâ€™s search bar.

Navigate the onchain ecosystem with your all-in-one browser extension today!
